products.name: Accell - Power Wall Charger with Holder for Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen and 2 USB-A Charging Ports - Black
products.description: Have an Amazon Echo Dot 3? A passthrough wall charger with Echo Dot (3rd Gen) Holder and 2 USB Type A charging ports, the Accell Power Wall Charger in Black allows you to easily mount your Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Generation onto any standard wall outlet without blocking the other outlets. The holder secures the hub itself and provides a clean and neat cable management design around the holder.

products.name: AcuRite - Alarm Clock with Weather Station and USB Charging - White/Black
products.description: Wake up with a charged phone and all the weather information you need to start your day! This AcuRite weather forecaster features an alarm clock with snooze and provides hyperlocal weather conditions and a personal forecast. The handy USB port allows you to plug in your phone or other device.

products.name: AcuRite - Atlas Weather Station - White/Black
products.description: This AcuRite professional home weather station features a 7-in-1 wireless outdoor sensor and a high-definition white indoor display. Optimize your home or office while keeping tabs on your hyperlocal weather conditions. This weather station comes with a one-year limited warranty.

products.name: AcuRite - Digital Fridge and Freezer Thermometer - White
products.description: The AcuRite digital fridge and freezer thermometer provides internal temperature measurements on one easy-to-read display. Two separate remote sensors wirelessly relay temperature information to the display, which also provides historical high and low temperatures and a programmable alarm. Whether used in the kitchen or as a chest freezer thermometer, keep your food supply safe with this AcuRite digital thermometer. This wireless fridge and freezer thermometer comes with a one-year limited warranty.

products.name: AcuRite - Forcast Station - White
products.description: Always know your hyperlocal weather conditions with this AcuRite weather station! The included outdoor sensor wirelessly relays temperature to the illuminated color display, which provides the indoor temperature and humidity measurements and your personalized weather forecast for the next 12-24 hours. The display can be mounted on a wall using its integrated keyhole or stand upright for tabletop use.

products.name: AcuRite - Iris (5-in-1) Pro Weather Station with High-Definition Display and Lightning Detection - Multi
products.description: Track multiple weather conditions at your precise location instead of relying on weather data usually taken from your nearest airport. The AcuRite Iris (5-in-1) outdoor weather sensor boasts a rugged, weatherproof construction and an automatic, self-draining rain gauge. It features dual solar cells that power an internal fan to maximize ambient temperature accuracy at all hours of the day. For additional accuracy, the temperature, humidity, and barometric pressure measurements can be manually calibrated if sensor placement or environmental factors impact data accuracy.

products.name: AcuRite - Iris (5-in-1) Weather Station - White/Black
products.description: This AcuRite Iris (5-in-1) home weather station comes with a wireless mini (5-inch) display to provide you with a wealth of hyperlocal weather knowledge! Boost your home, workspace, or campsite and receive essential weather information, the indoor temperature, and the time and date.

products.name: AcuRite - Iris (5-in-1) Weather Station with Direct-to-Wi-Fi Display for Remote Monitoring - White/Black
products.description: The AcuRite Iris (5-in-1) weather station provides essential weather information to keep you in the know. The easy-to-see, auto-dimming color display receives wirelessly transmitted weather measurements from the outdoor weather sensor. The cleverly designed information center allows for maximum info without clutter and provides the time and date. When connected to Wi-Fi, this weather station enables you to monitor the weather and receive alerts while on the go.

products.name: AcuRite - Iris (5-in-1) Weather Station with Vertical Color Display for Hyperlocal Weather Forecasting - White/Black
products.description: This AcuRite Iris (5-in-1) home weather station comes with a vertical color display to provide you with a wealth of hyperlocal weather knowledge! Enhance your home or workspace and receive essential weather information along with the time, date, and even the current moon phase.

products.name: AcuRite - Notos Weather Station - White/Black
products.description: This AcuRite Notos (3-in-1) home weather station comes with a color display to provide you with a wealth of hyperlocal weather knowledge! Optimize your home or workspace and receive essential weather information, indoor comfort measurements, and the time and date. Named best 3-in-1 Weather Station by Lifewire in 2023.

products.name: Acer - Aspire 3 Thin & Light Laptop - 15.6" Full HD IPS Touch Display - AMD Ryzen 5 7520U - 8GB LPDDR5 - 512GB SSD - Wi-Fi 6 - Steam Blue

products.name: 5.25" Wireless Bass Subwoofer for Roku Streambar, Roku Streambar Pro, and Roku TV with Roku Wireless Speakers - Black

The slim design easily fits into most spaces, adding deep bass to your setup at an incredible value. Movies and music come to life with more dynamic sound and full response. You’ll hear—and feel—the difference, from the roar of the big game to the drum solo on your favorite playlist. And like all Roku Audio products, it’s easy to use and simple to set up. Just power on and wirelessly pair whenever you’re ready to add an extra kick of bass to any room in your home.

products.name: Alpine - Turn1™  Waterproof Bluetooth® Speaker & Bracket - Black
products.description: The Alpine Turn1™ is ready for outdoor adventure! It is completely waterproof - bring it outside to the pool, to the bonfire, anywhere you want big sound. Even in open-air with wind or other noise, your music still comes through clear. The built-in battery supports 12+ hours of playtime, and the included carry strap allows you to take your music with you where ever you go! The AD-SPK1PRO also includes a universal mounting bracket to attach it to your Jeep® Wrangler or Side x Side roll bars for even more adventure options!

products.name: Alpine - Turn1™ Portable Waterproof Bluetooth® Speaker - Black

products.name: Altec Lansing - HydraBlast Everything Proof Speaker - Black
products.description: The HydraBlast Everything Proof speaker is the perfect party companion. With up to 20 hours of battery life plus built-in LED light modes, the party atmosphere and music will be hard to top! Qi Wireless charging keeps not only your phone but the party alive, simply drop a Qi-compatible device atop the speaker and watch it charge! Don't have a phone with wireless charging - the HydraBlast comes equipped with a USB smartphone charger for added functionality. With an IP67 Everything Proof (waterproof, snowproof, and dirtproof) rating + Antimicrobial protection (repels 99.9% of bacteria), nothing can stop the HydraBlast. Pair two HydraBlast's together for that surround sound excitement. The party just got better with Altec Lansing!

products.name: Altec Lansing - HydraJolt Everything Proof Speaker - Black
products.description: The HydraJolt Everything Proof Speaker is a powerful, portable wireless speaker. It is waterproof, dustproof, shockproof and it floats in water with it's IP67 Everything Proof rating. Antimicrobial protection repels 99.9% of bacteria, so you don't need to fret the germs. A built-in smartphone charger and 16 hours of battery make sure you're connected during every adventure. The HydraJolt has a built-in carabineer that can be clipped to a backpack, dufflebag, or beach chair for tunes on the go! Pair two HydraJolts together via True Wireless Pairing for double the sound! Built-in LED light modes will beat, strobe and pulse to the music for added fun.

products.name: DuraPro - 43" Class LED Outdoor Partial Sun 4K UHD Smart webOS TV
products.description: Experience crisp, detailed visuals and upgrade your backyard entertainment setup with the 43-inch DuraPro smart outdoor partial sun UHD LED TV. This TV features a beautiful 4K display with HDR and 500-nit brightness for a clearer immersive experience that’s up to 60% brighter than indoor TVs. The DuraPro smart TV is compatible with Wi-Fi and powered by webOS, so you can access news, sports, entertainment and more with ease. Ideal for partially shaded outdoor living areas, such as covered patios and gazebos, the rugged, weatherproof IP54-rated exterior and tempered glass screen provide extra protection against rain, dust, UV rays and more. Includes a waterproof remote bag and compatible TV wall mount for the ultimate streamlined living space design.

products.name: Furrion - 50” Partial Sun 4K UHD Smart Outdoor TV
products.description: Designed to deliver a stunning viewing experience, the Furrion Aurora 4K outdoor smart TV is ideal for outdoor entertainment. It features a 4K ultra-high definition (UHD), 750-nit LED screen that delivers a crystal-clear url and an ultra-bright picture at four times the resolution of full HD. This particular partial sun model is designed for partially sunny outdoor living areas such as a patio, deck or yard. With a weatherproof housing and IP54 rating, the Furrion Aurora partial sun 4K LED outdoor TV is engineered to withstand the harsh effects of UV rays, rain, snow, dirt, dust, insects and humidity. This outside TV also has integrated smart technology that allows for online streaming readiness. No need for an additional streaming device – the TV is equipped and ready to stream your favorite TV shows, sports and movies from the service of your choosing. All you need is a WiFi connection. The Aurora also features RangeXtend™ external antennas to boost signal strength. For an immersive entertainment experience, be sure to enhance your viewing with a Furrion outdoor soundbar!

products.name: Furrion - Aurora 43" Full Shade Smart 4K UHD LED Outdoor TV
products.description: Designed to deliver a stunning viewing experience, the Furrion Aurora 4K outdoor smart TV is ideal for outdoor entertainment. It features a 4K ultra-high definition (UHD), 400-nit LED screen that delivers a crystal-clear url and an ultra-bright picture at four times the resolution of full HD. This particular full-shade model is designed for fully shaded outdoor living areas such as covered patios or gazebos. With a weatherproof housing and IP54 rating, the Furrion Aurora 4K outdoor smart TV is engineered to withstand the harsh effects of UV rays, rain, snow, dirt, dust, insects and humidity. It can withstand extreme operating temperatures from -24°F to 122°F and comes with a smart remote for convenient viewing outdoors. Enjoy stunning images with a 4K Super 35mm DGO Sensor and all the built-in features you could ask for, including ND Filters, mini XLRs, direct touch rotatable LCD screen, Dual Pixel CMOS Autofocus, and excellent battery life. Making the EOS C70 even more powerful is compatibility with Canon's expanding line of high-performance RF Lenses.  The lens kit includes the RF24-105mm F4 L IS USM lens—a wide-angle to short telephoto zoom lens featuring advanced optics and NANO USM for smooth, fast, virtually silent AF, plus bright f/4 maximum aperture and 5-stop-effective url stabilization for richly detailed photos and videos.

products.name: Canon - EOS M6 Mark II Mirrorless Camera (Body Only) - Black
products.description: Take and share stunning photos with this Canon EOS M6 Mark II digital camera. The advanced 32.5MP CMOS sensor lets you capture gorgeous images, and Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity let you transfer images directly to your smartphone. This Canon EOS M6 Mark II digital camera has a 3-inch touchscreen that makes it easy to review captured images and videos.  .

products.name: Canon - EOS R10 Mirrorless Camera (Body Only) - Black
products.description: The EOS R10 is perfect for content creators looking to take their creativity to the next level. Featuring a high-speed shooting 15 FPS mechanical shutter^,~ a 24.2 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor, and lightning-fast auto-focus, all in a sleek, lightweight design.

products.name: 2-Piece Probe Set for Napoleon ACCU-PROBE Bluetooth Thermometer - Black and Stainless Steel
products.description: Make sure all of your food is cooked to perfection by adding two extra probes to your Napoleon ACCU-PROBE Bluetooth Thermometer with this Probe Kit. Two extra probes, extra color-coded probe markers, and two stacking cord storage wraps to keep everything tangle-free. Use these extra probes with the Napoleon ACCU-PROBE Bluetooth Thermometer (*NOT INCLUDED*). Grill steaks and roasts exactly how you want them by setting custom temperatures, ensuring everyone gets exactly what they want. Napoleon's 2 Piece Probe Set for ACCU-PROBE Bluetooth Thermometer is an ideal addition for use on the barbecue grill, oven and even the frying pan.

products.name: 3-Month Brewer Care Kit for Most Keurig Coffee Makers
products.description: Keep your coffee maker clean and fresh with this Keurig three-month brewer maintenance kit. Four rinse pods help minimize the carryover of flavors between brews, while the descaling solution eliminates mineral buildup and extends the life of your machine. This Keurig three-month brewer maintenance kit includes two water filter cartridge refills to ensure you get quality brewed coffee every time.

products.name: 48-Oz. Dry Grains Container for Vitamix Ascent Series Blenders - Transparent/Black
products.description: Increase the capability of your Ascent series blender with this 48-oz. Vitamix container. It grinds whole spices and kneads thick dough to enhance the quality of your recipes, and the laser-cut blades are made of hardened stainless steel for long life and durability. This BPA-free Vitamix container has a removable 2-oz. lid plug for adding ingredients as you blend.

products.name: Aer Disc Container for Most Vitamix Full-Size Blenders - Transparent
products.description: Create muddled, foamed, emulsified and whipped concoctions with this Vitamix Aer Disc Container blender attachment. Small holes in the disc pull liquids through without pureeing solid ingredients to create just the right consistency for creative sauces, mixed drinks and dessert toppings. This Vitamix Aer Disc Container blender attachment is made of BPA-free Eastman Tritan plastic for durability.

products.name: Americana - 150W Hand Blender with detachable wand - Blue
products.description: Blending is now easier than ever with the Americana Hand Blender.  The powerful 150W motor allows you to whip egg whites, blend soups, mix salad dressing, and even puree baby food.  Its thoughtful "stick" design allows you to blend right in the bowl, pot or pitcher.

products.name: Americana - Retro Personal Blender - Mint
products.description: Enjoy your favorite shakes, fruit smoothies, or power packed protein drinks with the Americana Collection by Maxi-Matic Retro Personal Blender. Comes with one 16 oz glass mason jar & lid and a 20 oz sports bottle with drinking lid so you can enjoy your tasty creations on the go. The blender has a powerful 300 W motor and is easy to store. The handy pulse lever makes it easy to start and stop the machine. The power indicator illuminates when the blender is ready to use and the operating light lets you know the machine’s in operation.

products.name: Anova - Precision Cooker 3.0
products.description: Pro-level results, easier than ever. Our best-seller, only better. The first Anova Precision Cooker launched in 2014 and started a home-cooking revolution — bringing sous vide to the masses and making Anova a household name in the process. This third generation of our flagship sous vide circulator adds key improvements, making perfect results easier to achieve than ever before

products.name: Anova - Precision Cooker Nano 3.0
products.description: Intro-level price. Pro-level results. For food nerds, by food nerds. Our most compact cooker is still huge on results. This latest iteration of our entry-level sous vide circulator adds key improvements as requested by food nerds, for an even sweeter deal on perfect meals.

products.name: Anova - Precision Vacuum Sealer - Black
products.description: Meet your food storage and sous vide cooking needs with this Anova Precision vacuum sealer. The simple one-touch operation and fast air extraction help you save time preparing food, and the compact size takes up minimal counter space. This Anova Precision vacuum sealer works with most bag and roll sizes for versatility.

products.name: Anova - Precision Vacuum Sealer Bags (Rolls) - Clear
products.description: Retain the juices and aroma of your sous vide dishes with these Anova Precision vacuum sealer bag rolls. The seam-welded seven-layer construction holds up under long cooking periods, and the double-rib design enables faster air extraction during the vacuum-sealing process. These BPA-free Anova Precision vacuum sealer bag rolls are safe to store in the refrigerator and freezer for easy use.

products.name: Acer - Aspire TC-1770-UR11 Desktop-Intel Core i5-13400 10-8GB Memory-512GB SSD - Black
products.description: Make everyday easlier with the high-performance Aspire TC. From basic computing to multimedia entertainment, it’s a robust hub for your every computing need. Snap between tasks with the latest 13th Gen Intel Core i5 processor and 8GB of memory, this sophisticated PC delivers plenty of speed, power and storage so you can play, create, do more! Easily expandable and with remarkable performance, the Aspire TC Series is the perfect partner when it comes to demanding tasks like video editing and compiling photo albums. And it offers front-panel media access so you can easily connect to your digital devices.

products.name: Acer - Aspire XC-840-UB11 Desktop- Intel Celeron N4505 -8GB Memory- 512GB SSD - Black
products.description: The Aspire XC is the perfect PC to tackle any task. From basic computing to multimedia entertainment, it’s a robust hub for your every computing need. Driven by an Intel Celeron N4505 processor and 8GB of memory, this sophisticated black chassis design delivers plenty of speed, power and storage so you can play, create, do and enjoy more—all day, every day! Easily expandable and with remarkable performance, the Aspire XC Series desktop is the perfect partner when it comes to demanding tasks like video editing and compiling photo albums. And it offers front-panel media access so you can easily connect to your digital devices!

products.name: Acer - Veriton N4690GT Desktop - Intel Core i5 - 16GB Memory - 512GB SSD - Black
products.description: The eco-friendly Acer Veriton Vero Mini PC provides commercial grade performance without the need for a bulky tower, all while utilizing post-consumer recycled (PCR) plastics. Equipped with an Intel Core processor and graphics and featuring multiple interfaces and ports for expansion, giving you the opportunity to configure your way.

products.description: The Veriton business desktops provide professional levels of performance, security, and manageability. With premium SSD storage drives give improved speeds and performance on nearly everything you do. Get plenty of connectivity options with a fast and stable wireless connection and an array of USB and display ports for all your peripherals.`

Intel processors provide lightning fast speed and peak performance even for toughest tasks and intensive games.
